acts.act: Protection of children from sexual offence act 2012

business_details.Business: Accused Shri Rajiv Munda is present.            The Judgment is pronounced and delivered   in the open court. The Judgment is prepared in the separate sheets.           In the result, I find that the prosecution has failed to prove its case against the accused person beyond all reasonable doubts. Hence on benefit of doubts, the accused person Shri Rajiv Munda is hereby acquitted from the charge brought against him and let him be set at liberty forthwith. The bail bond shall be stood cancelled after 6 (six) months. Accordingly this case is disposed on contest.           Accordingly this case is disposed on contest.
